Question: Anatoly Sobchak was at the time an Assistant Professor and lectured this person's class on Business Law (khozyaystvennoye pravo).
Hints: This person biographer Masha Gessen has stated that "This person is a dictator," comparing him to Alexander Lukashenko.
Koni is often seen at this person's side and has been known to accompany him into staff meetings and greet world leaders.
Russia's legal reform continued productively during this person's first term.
